data.description: Use scraping to extract results from search
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Google abandoned its search API service in this month, and actually
    it had already suspended new key application for several years.
    Also, the new AJAX search AP is definitely not powerful enough.

    Use scraping may be the only way to extract ranking info from
    search engines result in the near future.

    WWW::Search::Scrape might become a start for, -
    WWW::Search::Scrape::Google - WWW::Search::Scrape::Baidu -
    WWW::Search::Scrape::Bing etc.
